mapper.insert: insert into users (first_name, last_name, user_name, password, zip_code) values (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{zipCode})
mapper.select: select u.id as id, u.first_name as first_name, u.last_name as last_name, u.user_name as user_name, u.password as password, u.zip_code as zip_code, o.id as order_id, op.id as order_products_id, op.order_id as order_products_order_id, op.product_id as order_products_product_id, p.id as product_id, p.title as product_title, p.description as product_description, p.quantity as product_quantity, p.price as product_price from users u left join orders o on o.user_id = u.id left join order_products op on op.order_id = o.id left join products p on op.product_id = p.id where u.id = #{id};
